page.title: 17CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: In the{school playground}children play games such as Hopscotch, Tigs or Pig In The Middle. {Hopscotch}is played on 8 numbered squares drawn on the ground; you have to throw a stone into square 1 and then by hopping or skipping from square to square collect the stone and bring it back. You then throw the stone in to square 2 and repeat the game until you miss the square you are aiming at. In{Tigs}you chase someone and try to "tig" them by touching them; then they have to chase the other children. In{Pig In The Middle}three children play together in a line with the middle one trying to catch the ball as the others throw it to each other. If the middle one catches the ball, the one who threw it goes in the middle.
